h2. Request

Support for **native** gradients for views, such as label, view etc

comments.body:
I don't know whether this is a sign of a regression but before when I set a gradient on a view or TableViewRow, Android would just ignore it.
I tried setBackgroundGradient() on a tableViewRow in Android and it gave a red-screen Run Time Error - "TableViewRow has no method setBackgroundGradient"
Having the Runtime throw an error on this just makes life more complicated because you have to conditionally assign the gradients.
This was with the 2.1.3 SDK on MacOS.
We support a number of gradients now. There's too many tickets to link them all. Closing old ticket as invalid now.
